content: Hello Jeyachandran, nice to meet you! I'm Jeyachandran, the manager at this company. I see we have the same name, that's quite interesting. Let's get started with the technical round of the interview. Can you start by telling me about your experience with React and its ecosystem?

Yes sir, I have many projects completed in React. Recently I completed React project in Event Management System. It is the 4 user login. One is the admin login and the club member, great point and student login. It is one of the best in mind.

That sounds interesting. Can you walk me through the implementation of user authentication in your Event Management System project? Specifically, how did you handle the login functionality and session management for the different types of users?
Yes sir, I have maintained the section in my authentication using the JWT token, JavaScript token using manage my section and the admin user I set the admin key.

So you used JSON Web Tokens (JWT) to implement authentication and authorization in your Event Management System. How did you ensure the validity of the JWT tokens and handle situations like token expiration or invalid tokens?
